text: Beorg's battle-standard is borne by the hardy warrior, Oerl the Young -- a entire bearskin whose grizzly head leers out from the top. The skin is touched by the power of Chaos, and the blessings of the gods is such that the banner radiates an aura of rage that drives the already fierce Ursfjordings into a terrible battle-fury that is impossible to contain.
Just another trophy to hang in some lavish hall

Originally the Watch Captain of Ubersreik, X was drafted to serve as Captain Guard in the Fortress of Helmgart. X is a bear of a man unfased by the cold climate of the Grey Mountains and has faced all kinds of threats in the melting pot that is Ubersreik. His presence on the Fortress Walls inspire the brethren facing any foe daring enough to climb their final fate.
This massive, yellowed canine is the sacred talisman of lordship amongst Beorg's people. He bears it about his neck. The talisman serves to ward off blows that would otherwise harm its wearer.
